mapper.select: select gid,gname,price,stock,mouthlySales,totalSales,evaluationNum from tb_commodity order by totalsales desc limit 0,#{num}
select gid,gname,price,stock,mouthlySales,totalSales,evaluationNum from tb_commodity where gname like concat(concat("%",#{gname}),"%") order by mouthlysales desc
select tid from (select tid,count(*),uid from tb_foot f left outer join tb_tag t on t.gid=f.gid and uid=#{uid} and level=3 group by tid order by count(*) desc limit 0,2) t
select gid,gname,price,stock,mouthlySales,totalSales,evaluationNum from tb_commodity where gid in(select gid from tb_tag where tid=#{tid} ) limit 0,3
select uid,gid,wen from tb_wen where wen=#{uid}
select uid,gid,wen from tb_wen where wen=#{uid} and gid=#{gid}
